_header: It strengtheth man in his fighting
_description: The benefits of Corpus Christi — two quatrains in John Grimestone’s sermon notebook

NLS18721.Transcription:
It strengþit man in is fitingAȝenis felle fonIt fillit
                    man in is etingWith graces mani onIt helit man of is
                    seknesse& kepit him fro deyȝingIt bringet man to gret
                    suetnesse& to ioyȝe withouten ending
NLS18721.Note:
Preceded by ‘Effectus corpus Christi digne
                    sumentibus’.
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 13.
